name: Dark Iron Sword
description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

passiveDescription.0: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.1: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <cryo>25%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.2: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.3: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <cryo>35%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.4: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <cryo>40%</cryo> for 12s.
